, LLC 2925 Fairfax Trafficway Kansas City, KS 66115 Job Title:
Director of Business Development Position Overview The Director of Business Development is responsible for expanding the company's core business, identifying new and diverse channels, as well as building our company's physical brand presence.
The Director of Business Development will work for the EVP of Sales and will constantly work on developing new opportunities to develop plans and ideas to create new sales, business, distribution and customer opportunities.
Essential Job Functions Develop and execute new strategic channel and business plans with EVP of Sales (and CEO), including:
Identify and land new non-grocery customers and channels for existing Tuscany Candle Collections.
Identify and land new customer opportunities and segments we do not currently serve (e.
g.
department stores, other retailers, multi-unit gift stores, e-commerce) Where appropriate, identify contract manufacturing or private label customers that fit our business and distribution model.
Sell in new Tier 1/higher end collections (to be developed) into appropriate non-grocery channels.
Research, plan, and implement new target market, channel and customer initiatives.
Identify leads and develop and move them along the sales cycle toward closing.
Collaborate with Sales and Marketing to identify new customers, channels and product development opportunities.
Track emerging candle markets, trends, gaps, development opportunities and win new business.
Establish productive, professional relationships with key personnel in assigned customer accounts.
With guidance from EVP of Sales, recommend and negotiate price and service agreements Meet assigned targets for profitable sales volume and strategic objectives in assigned accounts.
Perform data analysis to track business performance and identify opportunities to grow revenue and profit.
Propose and develop strategic partnerships, and prepare business development documents and plans to support them.
Help to execute the company's long-term objectives of diversification with the right new channels and business.
Requirements, Skills & Experience To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily.
The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required.
Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, business or related degree.
5 -7 years of candle or home d cor industry or similar retail channels (such as, gift, home goods or department stores, etc.
) Experience selling home d cor, candles, home goods products, gift or similar products AND retailers.
Experience developing strategic manufacturing partnerships.
Must be able to demonstrate a successful track record in a past Business Development role.
Must be able to travel up to 50% - 75% of time with overnight stays.
Strong drive to acquire new business.
Exhibit strong initiative, proactiveness and follow through.
Collaboration and negotiation skills Lead Generation and management.
Exceptional attention to detail.
Ability to understand customer analytics and performance management.
Understand the core consumer and the buying experience.
Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software experience Excellent relationship building, presentation and communication skills.
This is not necessarily an exhaustive list of responsibilities, skills, duties, requirements, efforts, or working conditions associate with the job.
While this list is intended to be an accurate reflection of the current job, the Company reserves the right to revise the functions and duties of the job or to require that additional or different tasks be performed when circumstances change (i.
e.
, emergencies, changes in personnel, work load, rush jobs, or technological developments).
